amendatorysection.catchline: Operators' licenses; state identification cards; department; power to verify documents.
amendatorysection.para: This section applies beginning on an implementation date designated by the director on or before January 1, 2014. Before issuing any operator's license or state identification card under the Motor Vehicle Operator's License Act, the department may verify, with the issuing agency, the issuance, validity, and completeness of each document required to be presented by a person pursuant to sections 60-484 and 60-484.04.
